author: Reuters Editorial
title: Stamps.Com Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.54
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Stamps.Com Inc:
* STAMPS.COM REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.54
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.54 * Q1 REVENUE $133.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $123 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.90 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $7.73 TO $8.70
* SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE TO BE IN A RANGE OF APPROXIMATELY $530 MILLION TO $560 MILLION
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP ADJUSTED INCOME PER FULLY DILUTED SHARE TO BE IN A RANGE OF $9.60 TO $10.60 Source text for Eikon:
Our
